document_data.mainbody:
Sulchras was a festhall of some repute in Suzail, the capital of Cormyr, in the mid-to-late 14 century DR.
Sulchras Festhall stood on Coachwheels Way, just north from where it came to a moot with Swordstars Lane. Across the street from the establishment stood the Thousandheads Trading Coster yards.
